basics.name: Joey Nhieu
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A in Management Information Systems(MIS) in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

work.position: Peer Tutor - ICS 111 Intro to Computer Science I
work.summary: Aids in monitoring of University and State wide broadcasting, assists in processing and preparation of equipment loans to UH faculty/staff.
highlights: Meets with assigned participant(s) on a regular scheduled basis for the purpose of tutoring in course materials and study skills
Meets with instructors as needed to discuss the needs of tutee(s)

work.summary: Aids in monitoring of University and State wide broadcasting, assists in processing and preparation of equipment loans to UH faculty/staff.
highlights: Performed monitoring and troubleshooting of the University’s statewide HD videoconferencing system
Performed ingesting and routing of analog/digital content for broadcast on the University’s cable channel
Performed monitoring of analog/digital audio and video quality in the University's digital playback facility
Created trouble log entries into online database
Assisted Electronics Technicians and Engineers in maintenance, wiring and construction of new and existing ITV classrooms
When available provided assistance to video production team

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Distinction awarded to undergraduate students who earned a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade.
